metadata.description: Professional Laravel and Livewire development toolkit featuring 11 specialized AI agents, 35 slash commands, Python hook system for delegating agents with security checks and session management, and custom status lines for building modern PHP applications with Laravel 12, Livewire 4, and Filament 4

plugins.name: laravel-development
plugins.description: Core Laravel development with 9 specialized agents (architecture, Eloquent, testing, security, optimization, Pulse, Reverb, Socialite, Prompts), 17 slash commands for models, migrations, controllers, jobs, and more. Includes Python hook system optimized for delegating agents with security checks (dangerous command blocking, .env protection), session management, transcript backups, sub-agent tracking, and custom status lines with git integration

plugins.name: livewire-development
plugins.description: Livewire 4 reactive components with specialized agent and 4 slash commands for creating components, forms, layouts, and attributes

plugins.name: filament-development
plugins.description: Filament 4 admin panels with specialized agent and 11 slash commands for resources, pages, widgets, themes, panels, clusters, importers, exporters, and custom fields

plugins.name: vue-nuxt-development
plugins.description: Vue 3 + Nuxt 4 + TypeScript development with 8 specialized agents (Vue/Nuxt architecture, TypeScript, state management, testing, security, UX, performance) and 8 slash commands for components, pages, layouts, composables, stores, plugins, middleware, and API clients

plugins.name: magento2-development
plugins.description: Magento 2 / Adobe Commerce development with 4 specialized agents (Magento architecture, e-commerce specialist, performance, security) and 4 slash commands for modules, models, controllers, and plugins

plugins.name: wordpress-development
plugins.description: WordPress 6.0+ development with 6 specialized agents (WordPress architecture, theme/plugin specialists, Gutenberg expert, WooCommerce specialist, security) and 11 slash commands for themes, plugins, blocks, post types, taxonomies, widgets, REST API, and shortcodes
